languages.text: {n}Я обращаюсь мыслью к {rt_mf|нему|ней}, ибо передо мной {rt_mf|его|ее} люди. Как поступил{rt_mf||а} бы с ними {rt_mf|тот|та}, чью нить я умащиваю своей кровью?{/n}
{n}I turn my thoughts to {rt_mf|him|her}, for it is {rt_mf|his|her} people that are standing before me. What would {rt_mf|he|she} do, the one whose thread I anoint with my blood?{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Я обращаюсь мыслью к {rt_mf|нему|ней}, ибо передо мной {rt_mf|его|ее} люди. Как поступил{rt_mf||а} бы с ними {rt_mf|тот|та}, чью нить я умащиваю своей кровью?{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}I turn my thoughts to {rt_mf|him|her}, for it is {rt_mf|his|her} people that are standing before me. What would {rt_mf|he|she} do, the one whose thread I anoint with my blood?{/n}

{n}I turn my thoughts to {mf|him|her}, for it is {mf|his|her} people that are standing before me. What would {mf|he|she} do, the one whose thread I anoint with my blood? I seek {mf|his|voice} inside my mind.{/n}

{n}I turn my thoughts to {mf|him|her}, for it is {mf|his|her} people that are standing before me. What would {mf|he|she} do, the one whose thread I anoint with my blood? I seek {mf|his|her} voice inside my mind.{/n}

{n}I turn my thoughts to {mf|him|her}, for it is {mf|his|her} people that are standing before me. What would {mf|he|she} do, the one whose thread I anoint with my blood? I seek {mf|his|her} voice inside my mind.{/n}
{n}I turn my thoughts to {rt_mf|him|her}, for it is {rt_mf|his|her} people that are standing before me. What would {rt_mf|he|she} do, the one whose thread I anoint with my blood?{/n}
{n}I turn my thoughts to {rt_mf|him|her}, for it is {rt_mf|his|her} people that are standing before me. What would {rt_mf|he|she} do, the one whose thread I anoint with my blood?{/n}
{n}I turn my thoughts to {rt_mf|him|her}, for it is {rt_mf|his|her} people that are standing before me. What would {rt_mf|he|she} do, the one whose thread I anoint with my blood?{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ich wende meine Gedanken {rt_mf|ihm|ihr} zu, denn es sind {rt_mf|seine|ihre} Leute, die da vor mir stehen. Was würde {rt_mf|er tun, dessen|sie tun, deren} Faden ich mit meinem Blut salbe? Ich suche {rt_mf|seine|ihre} Stimme in meinem Geist.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}I turn my thoughts to {rt_mf|him|her}, for it is {rt_mf|his|her} people that are standing before me. What would {rt_mf|he|she} do, the one whose thread I anoint with my blood?{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ich wende meine Gedanken {mf|ihm|ihr} zu, denn es sind {mf|seine|ihre} Leute, die da vor mir stehen. Was würde {mf|er tun, dessen|sie tun, deren} Faden ich mit meinem Blut salbe? Ich suche {mf|seine|ihre} Stimme in meinem Geist.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Dirijo mis pensamientos hacia {rt_mf|él|ella}, pues es su gente la que se haya frente a mí. ¿Qué haría {rt_mf|él|ella}, cuyo hilo unjo con mi sangre?{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}I turn my thoughts to {rt_mf|him|her}, for it is {rt_mf|his|her} people that are standing before me. What would {rt_mf|he|she} do, the one whose thread I anoint with my blood?{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Dirijo mis pensamientos hacia {mf|él|ella}, pues es su gente la que se haya frente a mí. ¿Qué haría {mf|él|ella}, cuyo hilo unjo con mi sangre? Busco su voz en mi mente.{/n}

languages.text: {n}{rt_mf|彼|彼女}に思考を合わせる…目の前に立っているのは{rt_mf|彼|彼女}の民なのだから。{rt_mf|彼|彼女}の糸にこの血を塗ったあの人ならどうするだろう？{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}I turn my thoughts to {rt_mf|him|her}, for it is {rt_mf|his|her} people that are standing before me. What would {rt_mf|he|she} do, the one whose thread I anoint with my blood?{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}{mf|彼|彼女}に思考を合わせる…目の前に立っているのは{mf|彼|彼女}の民なのだから。{mf|彼|彼女}の糸にこの血を塗ったあの人ならどうするだろう？心の中で{mf|彼|彼女}の声を求めた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}我开始思考秘者的事情，因为站在我面前的人是{rt_mf|他|她}的臣民。我已将我的鲜血印在{rt_mf|他|她}的额头上，如果换做是{rt_mf|他|她}，{rt_mf|他|她}又会怎么做呢？{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}I turn my thoughts to {rt_mf|him|her}, for it is {rt_mf|his|her} people that are standing before me. What would {rt_mf|he|she} do, the one whose thread I anoint with my blood?{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}我开始思考秘者的事情，因为站在我面前的人是{rt_mf|他|她}的臣民。我已将我的鲜血印在{rt_mf|他|她}的额头上，如果换做是{rt_mf|他|她}，{rt_mf|他|她}又会怎么做呢？{/n}

languages.text: {n}Je tourne mon esprit vers {rt_mf|lui|elle}, car ce sont ses gens qui se tiennent devant moi. Que veut-{rt_mf|il|elle} que je fasse, {rt_mf|lui|elle} dont j'ai oint le fil de mon sang ?{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}I turn my thoughts to {rt_mf|him|her}, for it is {rt_mf|his|her} people that are standing before me. What would {rt_mf|he|she} do, the one whose thread I anoint with my blood?{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Je tourne mon esprit vers {rt_mf|lui|elle}, car ce sont ses gens qui se tiennent devant moi. Que veut-{rt_mf|il|elle} que je fasse, {rt_mf|lui|elle} dont j'ai oint le fil de mon sang ?{/n}

languages.text: {n}Düşüncelerimi Hür Tacir'e çevirdim çünkü karşımda duran onun halkı. Kanımla ipliğini kutsadığım Hür Tacir, bu durumda olsa ne yapardı?{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}I turn my thoughts to {rt_mf|him|her}, for it is {rt_mf|his|her} people that are standing before me. What would {rt_mf|he|she} do, the one whose thread I anoint with my blood?{/n}
